des: "'When I tire of ordinary meat and cheese sandwiches for my brown-bag lunch, I try creative alternatives,' explains Mattie Cheek of Lawrenceburg, Kentucky. 'I love these ham and cheese sandwiches because they're so convenient and a little different.'"
ins: In a small bowl, combine cream cheese, Cheddar cheese, relish and mustard. Add ham. Divide mixture among three slices of bread; top with remaining bread to make sandwiches.
